title: Country and the Rock
description: Twelve-year-old Sean West, also known as Country, sees an explosion of light and finds clues that lead him to Clicker, a young alien from the planet Sory, that wants to know what it's like to be a boy on Earth. Country and his friends take Clicker fishing, they ride dirt bikes, and tangle with ground bees. They're not only thwarted by Country's sister, but by the local Sheriff, the FBI, and some thieves from Venatici.
author: S. Willett
